name: Ryane McLaine
description:
Action arcade game with retro pixel graphics.

Try demo for free here: https://pyshteek.itch.io/ryane-mclaine-demo

-Gamepad support
-Redefinable keys

-Complete objectives in 25 levels
-Destroy mechanic enemies with your gun
-Find door cards and escape trough exit doors
-Destroy control room with bomb.
-Defeat 5 bosses
-Collect coins and upgrade your power and weapon
